title: A pleasant new ballad of Tobias, wherein is shewed the wonderful things that chanced unto him in his youth, and how he wedded a yong [sic] damsel that had had seven husbands, and, never enjoyed their company, who were all slain by a wicked spirit. To a new tune.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, J. Wright, T. Vere, W. Gilbertson.,
